name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App download and revenue info - auto display on App Store and Google Play

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display download and revenue information for App Store and Google Play apps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App Store & Play Store Info is a powerful Chrome extension designed for app developers, market analysts, and app enthusiasts. It helps you quickly access key data for applications on both the App Store and Google Play Store, including download numbers and revenue information.
Key Features:
• Auto-detection: The extension automatically identifies and displays app information when you browse App Store or Google Play Store pages.
• Convenient Search: Built-in search functionality allows you to easily query information for any app without leaving your current page.


Whether you're looking to understand your competitors' app performance or track your own app's market position, this extension is your go-to tool.
